ge.edu.sangu.web

Class Grabber

  • java.lang.Object
    • ge.edu.sangu.web.Grabber
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestGrabber.DummyGrabber

    public class Grabber
extends java.lang.Object
    This class grabs HTML document from specified URLs, downloads and saves images to corresponding output folder.
    Author:
    John Brown
